title: LOST
summary: The survivors of a plane crash are forced to live with each other on a remote island, a dangerous new world that poses unique threats of its own.

title: House of cards
summary: A Congressman works with his equally conniving wife to exact revenge on the people who betrayed him.

title: Breaking Bad
summary: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine, with his former student, in order to secure his family's financial future.
